messages.subject: final reminder---deadlines
messages.msgSnippet: We interrupt your unschooling talk for a brief public announcement: Tomorrow is the deadline for hotel reservations at the special conference rate of
messages.messageBody:
We interrupt your unschooling talk for a brief public announcement:

Tomorrow is the deadline for hotel reservations at the special
conference rate of $89/night. The price jumps dramatically on Monday.
Please double-check to make sure you have made your reservations.

Registration deadline is this Thursday. It is also the cut-off for
preordering t-shirts and banquet meals. I cannot guarantee availability
of either if not ordered by Thursday, August 10th. Any registrations
made after the 10th will be at the "at the door" rate. Please get your
registrations in *this* week!

If you aren't yet on liveandlearnconference@yahoogroups.com e-list,
this would be a good time to move over there to keep conference
conversation confined there.

The schedule should be up soon. I'm almost finished with it!

Now back to your regularly scheduled unschooling chat....

~Kelly

Kelly Lovejoy
Conference Coordinator
Live and Learn Unschooling Conference
http://liveandlearnconference.org

"It's a small world...but a BIG life!" ~Aaron McGlohn. aged 6
